snippet: Levi Aron pleaded guilty Thursday to killing Leiby Kletzky, an 8-year-old boy whose disappearance last summer from an insular Hasidic community transfixed New York City.
abstract: Levi Aron pleads guilty to killing Leiby Kletzky, an 8-year-old boy whose disappearance in July 2011 from the insular Hasidic community of Borough Park Brooklyn, captivated New York City; Aron faces at least 40 years in prison on one charge of second-degree murder and one charge of second-degree kidnapping.
lead_paragraph: Levi Aron pleaded guilty Thursday to killing Leiby Kletzky, an 8-year-old boy whose disappearance last summer from an insular Hasidic community transfixed New York City.

headline.seo: Leiby Kletzky’s Killer, Levi Aron, Pleads Guilty to Murdering 8-Year-Old
headline.main: Man Pleads Guilty to Killing Brooklyn Boy Last Summer
headline.print_headline: Man Pleads Guilty to Killing Brooklyn Boy Last Summer
